snippet.title: Farewell, Eikon - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
GRAB THE DEMO HERE: https://lapouris.itch.io/farewell-eikon
OR ALTERNATIVELY HERE: https://gamejolt.com/games/farewell-eikon/618539
INDIEGOGO PAGE: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/farewell-eikon/coming_soon/x/28850503

Farewell, Eikon is an unconventional turn-based RPG that forgoes random encounters and levels and instead focuses on boss fights and stat-altering equipment.  Currently in development.

Features: 

- Gameplay focused on overworld exploration and unique encounters
- A battle system based on positioning and resource management.
- A strange plot with an even stranger cast of characters.
- A whole lot of pointless dialogue.
- And much more.

Credits:

Developer/Sprites/Writer: Lapouris_.
Music: Korschar.
Portraits: Linhesden.
RPG Maker MV: KADOKAWA Corporation/Yoji Ojima.
